title: Emerald Diamond Cascade Haaram - Timeless Elegance for Your Special Day
materials: Fine quality Emeralds (62.97 carats) with a beautiful saturation of colour
Brilliant Cut Diamonds (3.03 carats). Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: A stunning diamond and emerald cascade necklace. Features geometric emeralds framed with delicate clusters of diamonds creating a breath taking effect. Perfect marriage of modern design with timeless elegance. Diamond setting includes prong setting with floral motif arrangement.
occasions: or a grand reception. A statement piece for any special occasion
description: This exquisite Haaram is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship. The combination of vivid emeralds and brilliant diamonds creates a captivating allure. Its unique design and timeless beauty make it an heirloom piece to cherish for generations. Represents prosperity, growth, and enduring beauty, reflecting the rich traditions of South Indian jewelry.
